name: TextEditingCommands
desc: A built-in group of commands for searching, editing, and transforming selections of text.

items.name: init()
items.desc: A new value describing the built-in text-editing commands.

items.name: var body: some Commands
items.desc: The contents of the command hierarchy.

items.name: typealias Body
items.desc: The type of commands that represents the body of this command hierarchy.
